title: INSOON Robot Toys for Kids Building Set, 520 PCS App & Remote Control Robotics Kit 5-in-1 RC Wall Robot Engineer Tank Dinosaur Building Toys Gift for Kids 6 7 8 9 10 11 12+ Years Old Boys Girls
features: 5-in-1 Robot Building Toy - INSOON 5-in-1 robot toy allows kids to enjoy 5 different build-and-play experiences by assembling Wall Robot, Engineering Robot, Mech Dinosaur, Tank, Stunt Car, let their imagination run wild to create something to create something new. The 5-in-1 robotic set stimulates children's imagination and offers them hours of fun with 5 different models. (Only one model can be created at a time)

App & Remote Control - Kids can control the robot toy via the remote control or APP (the maximum range is 20m). There are 4 remote control modes available, path mode, gyro mode, one-handed and two-handed driving mode, and programming mode, allowing the vehicle to move in all directions and ways, providing endless fun for kids

FUN Educational Toys - The robot building toys is a great educational toy, which can help kids improve their hand-eye coordination, master fine motor skills, stimulates their imagination, and improve logical thinking while enjoy building. The APP programming function can help cultivate children's curiosity and love for math and science

Exquisite Workmanship & Powerful Motor - Made of high quality material, the robots for kids 8-12 is safe and flexible. The wrist, the head and the arms of the robot can move flexibly. And the RC wall robot for kids is powered by a high-speed motor, 2.4GHz remote control, stable signal and no interference

Ideal Gift for Kids - Exquisite workmanship and shape, movable remote control function can attract children's attention. It will be a great birthday Christmas gift for kids age 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 years old boys girls. Kids can have fun with friends and families, helping them strengthen parent-child interaction and realtionship
description: Product Description Children aged 6 to 14 years like robots, especially programmable remote controlled robots. 5-in-1 technology robot: The 5-in-1 robot can be assembled into three different shapes, including wall robot, engineering robot, mech dinosaur, tank, stunt car. Different robot shapes can meet the preferences of different children. App and remote control: With remote control and programming functions, children can have the fun of manipulating the robot after building. The robot can move forward and backward, turn left and right and you can also enter commands to complete the route you want to move forward. The diverse play options keep kids busy for hours and help them learn technology and science 360° rotating head Movable mouth Movable wheel INSOON Technic Remote Controlled Robot Construction Toy Made of high quality ABS material, the robot toy is non-toxic and safe for children. It's a great Christmas birthday gift for kids ages 6 7 8 9 10 11 12 13 14 boys and girls. Children can spend hours of fun with their friends and family, strengthening their communication and realationship whild building. Specifications: Remote control frequency: 2.4 GHz Maximum range: 10 - 20 m (30 - 60 ft) Batteries for car: 3 x 1.5 V AAA batteries (not included) Batteries for controller: 2 x 1.5 V AA batteries (not included) Remote controlled and app control This technical robot building toy can be controlled via a 2.4 GHz remote control and an app. The app has a gyroscope driving simulation remote control navigation path and a programming mode. Please note: Please download the free app by scanning the code on the packaging or the picture!
